Killing Floor is excellent for playing a challenging horror game night with a group of friends. Though I'm not usually partial to horror games, the fact this can be played with friends quickly and easily can make it a good laugh.

Also the fact there isn't a crosshairs onscreen makes the game that little bit more immersive, while also is a good excuse as for me being a bad shot.
Très bon jeu.

Getting sick of this, don't list a game with mac capability when there's clearly serious issues for mac users that have needed resolving for months, if you have a PC maybe it's great, would I recommend this game if you have a mac? No. Don't waste your time it doesn't work.
good game

I don't get it. I don't understand. 
I played about 30 minutes of this game and found it to be the worst game I've ever played.
Yet the Positive Reviews have people playing it for 2,000 hours and saying it's awesome.
Even the Negative Reviews seem silly - talking about not being able to "kill floors" and the title being misleading...

When I started my co-op game.... A horde of monsters shambled straight towards me.
I fired my gun and killed some of them... But they keep coming and not approaching in an interesting way... They just shamble directly towards you.... And you kill them - and they take a lot of shots to kill. Eventually you can buy more ammo.. And then you do the same again - monsters shamble towards you and you shoot them over and over.

There seemed to be no story. No point. Nothing interesting.

Just some sort of target practice simulator.
I'm in my 30's, I've been playing games for years. I'm done with games like this.
I'm looking to be involved in the game and the storyline and the choices - so the rise of RPG games has been a good thing in my opinion.

Killing Floor, however, is a truly awful game...

I don't get it. I don't understand....

Если в Left 4 Dead это тупой экшен с рамдомно генерируемыми зомбами.
То Killing Floor это хадкор где нет нарисованного прицела и количество зомборей зависет скоко играет людей.
По желанию можно скачать видоизменяющие моды на зомборей которые станут: демонами из DOOM, или из Dead Space.
Единсвенный минус долгая прокачака Техника и Командос у них помимо нанесения урона есть спецелизированое условие.
Играл на пирaткe, купил со скидкой и нежелею что не взял со всеми DLC за 124 руб. (я не любитель всяких там лишних пикселей вырезенных)

P.S. There's perks, :D

Very fun and intense FPS with great holiday themed updates to give you more creepy fluff to run away from. Teamwork is really strong in this game, and very important in the later waves, as you will get destroyed without your backup.

The levels are interested and well made, and the mobs have a lot of variation. It's not just a zombie game, it's a 'zombie with horrible mutations and oh god theres stuff sticking out of it and it's glowing and it can move fast and jump far' game.

One of the best multiplayer games out there, it's quick and easy to create or join a lobby and just have some casual zombie killing fun. The general idea is a simple one, kill zombies and survive the waves to earn money, use said money to buy weapons to kill the later zombie and eventually defeat the boss. A recipe done before countless times. However due to a level based class system there is a reason to play as each off the classes, they offer bonuses when you use them. These bonuses can range from a simple damage boost with a weapon type and discount on weapon types to full blown free weapons on start.

Very fun and addictive, but best played with friends.
Cheaper then drugs so you should buy it.

An interesting Perk-Based zombie killing FPS from Tripwire Interactive (same guys who made the Red Orchestra series).
Though there is a solo mode, I recommend grabbing a few of your friends and jumping into a server to get the full experience.

Отличное рубилово с друзьями чтобы снять напряжение! Противники наступают волнами, после каждой волны закупаемся и опять в бой, в конце босс. Жалко что мало функций у сварки(в том плане что баррикады строить нельзя, можно только дверь заварить). Физика, баллистика и графика присутствует. Для игры пятилетней давности 9/10
